STM: Struggled with the demands of Comp Sci courses, particularly Java programming.
MTM: Adjusting to the academic rigor of college and the fast-paced environment of NYC.
LTM: Transitioned from high school to college, focusing on tech-related fields.

short_term.goal: Complete the Java programming course with at least a B-
Join a coding club or attend hackathons to expand network

long_term: Develop a strong foundation in computer science to enter the tech industry.

plot_points.description: Xavier faces the decision to either continue struggling with coding or pivot to another tech-related field.

STM: Made friends in class and navigated social interactions in college.
MTM: Explored the social scene of college life and the city of NYC.
LTM: Began the journey of personal independence and identity exploration.

short_term.goal: Organize a social event or outing with new friends
Reach out to high school friends to reconnect

long_term: Establish a solid network of friends and meaningful relationships.

plot_points.description: Xavier deals with feelings of not belonging and the pressure to fit in.

STM: Faced sleep issues due to late-night studying and social activities.
MTM: Adapted to the physical demands of college life, including managing stress.
LTM: Adjusted to new living conditions and established basic health routines.

short_term.goal: Engage in regular physical activity, even if it's just walking

long_term: Maintain a balanced lifestyle that supports both mental and physical health.

STM: Experienced the high cost of living in NYC, including overpriced coffee.
MTM: Started to understand the financial implications of college life.
LTM: Learned the basics of managing personal finances from high school.

short_term.goal: Create a budget to manage expenses better
Look for part-time work or on-campus jobs

long_term: Achieve financial independence and start investing in personal growth.

STM: Reflected on the authenticity of happiness and social interactions.
MTM: Began questioning the purpose and expectations of college life.
LTM: Developed initial thoughts on technology's role in society from high school.

short_term.goal: Read a book on existentialism or philosophy to broaden perspectives

long_term: Develop a personal philosophy on technology's impact on identity and societal growth.

plot_points.description: Xavier experiences an existential crisis, questioning his life choices and future path.

STM: No recent interaction with $XVI or blockchain technology.
MTM: Explored tech events and opportunities in NYC, potentially related to blockchain.
LTM: Showed early interest in blockchain and Web3 from high school.
